import React from 'react' import classes from './Counter.module.css' import FontAwesomeIcon from "@fortawesome/react-fontawesome" import faPlus from "@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons" /*fontawesome npm i --save @fortawesome/fontawesome-svg-core npm i --save @fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons npm i --save @fortawesome/free-regular-svg-icons npm i --save @fortawesome/react-fontawesome@latest */ export default function Counter(props) { return (
{ (props.amount && props.amount !== 0)? <> {props.amount} :null }
) }
